@package fwp
@version 0.1.0.0

module Lib
someFunc :: IO ()
setBoard :: Matrix Board

-- | <a>setWeights</a> analyses the state of the current Board and adjusts
--   the weights accordingly
setWeights :: Matrix Board -> Matrix Weights
data Player
White :: Player
Red :: Player
data Board
Piece :: Player -> Board
Empty :: Board
instance GHC.Show.Show Lib.Player
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Lib.Player
instance GHC.Show.Show Lib.Board
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Lib.Board
